predicate.note: Frames file for 'scuttle' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry run-51.3.2, although that's not the usual sense.

example.name: ya scurvy dogs!
example.text: Few petitions, however, have actually delayed or scuttled mergers.

example.name: with instrument
example.text: But the government's action, which caught Jaguar management flat-footed, may scuttle the GM minority deal by forcing it to fight for all of Jaguar.
example.arg: the government's action, which caught Jaguar management flat-footed,
forcing it to fight for all of Jaguar

roleset.name: run like a spider or crab
roleset.note: This sense will never, ever occur.
